newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: L.C. Development completes property deal.
newsitem.headline: L.C. Development completes property deal.

text.p: L.C. Development Ltd said on Monday it had completed its purchase of a Singapore office and shopping complex through a 50:50 joint venture with state gaming firm Singapore Pools (Pte) Ltd.

It said in a statement the purchase of Paradiz Centre had been financed by loans from its shareholders as well as a Singapore $75 million financing package arranged by the Development Bank of Singapore Ltd.
